= IsWinNT class function =

*Project:* [SystemInformationUnit System Information Unit].

*Unit:* _PJSysInfo_.

*Class:* _[TPJOSInfo TPJOSInfo]_

{{{
class function IsWinNT: Boolean;
}}}

== Description ==

Returns True if an NT operating system is installed (including Windows 2000, Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 2003 Server and Windows 2008 Server), or False otherwise.
